version_description:
- Adds new campaigns: The Rise of Octavian, Civil War of Liberators
- Adds new conquest: Augustus Time
- Adds new expeditions: Expedition to Gaul, Conquest of Gaul
- Adds the function of retraining Unit Tactics
- Increases level cap of the Senate
- Bug fixes

- Adds new campaigns: Sicilian Rebellion, The End of the Republic
- Adds new expeditions: Expedition to Asia, Conquest of Asia
- Increases level cap of the Senate
- Bug fixes

- Adds new campaigns: Conquering Germania
- Adds new expeditions: Expedition to Germany
- Adds new conquest: Rome and Great Han
- Increases level cap of the Senate
- Bug fixes

- Adds new campaigns: Strike from the Han Dynasty
- Adds new expeditions: Conquest of Germany
- Bug fixes

- Added support for latest iPhones
- Compatible with iOS 14

- watch video to speed up tasks
- bug fixes

- New decisive battle level added. Deploy troops flexibly, constantly improve generals and defeat more powerful enemies
- Weekly membership added

- Adds two generals, Attila and Belisarius
- Adds exclusive banners for Attila and Spartacus
- Adds nine achievements related to generals and banners
- Adjusts the content of the tutorial levels

- Adds tribute rewards for the expedition (collected daily)
- Bug fixes
